title: Systematic Instructional Design Strategies to Enhance MOOC Learning Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in scientific disciplines and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Small-scale science MOOC conducted in mobile environments using digital devices, focusing on analyzing and improving academic engagement through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Identify three or more learning engagement measurement metrics and apply them to assessment tools
Analyze five or more factors that inhibit engagement in MOOC environments
Design three engagement enhancement strategies based on systematic literature mapping results
Learners can complete a project that enhances participation through small-group collaboration and the use of digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
